column3: comment:"This dawlance machine is looking really lovely as well as it's also working fine. Got it in really cheap price on 11.11 as compared to the market. Highly recommended to buy from here!!!"}
column6: comment:"Receive original product with well packed.\nMachine works very well.\nSurprise from warranty policy
column7: it will be start after 8 months.\nRecommend to all.\nExcellent experience with Dawlance
column11: comment:"Got the delivery but there's a paint out on the edge of the machine.\nDisappointed"}
column14: comment:"A good Quality and well packed machine. 100% satisfied by the supplier. Good quality material is used. I can say Dawlance is reliable. Only fault is electric wire is very short."}
